Shiva goddess Parvathi decided to create

from her body and shaped it into a
beautiful boy instructing him not to
allow anyone inside the palace without
her permission once when Lord Shiva

he will be known as Ganesha the leader
of the ganas and he will also be known
as the remover of all obstacles and will
be worshipped first at the start of all
ceremonies Ganesha is the god of wisdom
with his elephants head
